arts.ttl: Nicolas Pepe inspires Villarreal win against Arsenal on his return
arts.sum: With just a few days remaining before the start of the new season, Arsenal approached their pre-season fixture against Villarreal with serious intent. It was a crucial opportunity to fine-tune tactics, test squad depth, and build confidence. arts.ttl: Arsenal beaten by Villarreal on Gyokeres' first start as Dowman shines again
arts.sum: Viktor Gyokeres' first Arsenal start ended in defeat as Villarreal ran out 3-2 winners at the Emirates Stadium despite 15-year-old Max Dowman wowing the crowd again.
